item.title: Between Yam, Baguette, and Noodles
item.description: I’ve been thinking maybe this article isn’t really about learning Chinese at all. Im listening to Jden song where he says, “I write songs like these ones, simply as distractions to make me feel like im doing something bigger than my passions .. but im just lying to myself again” Maybe this piece is my version of that. Some days I feel like I’m writing this to inspire my future daughters.
